entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as asking Neville for help to get out. He is also referred to as 'we' when discussing the uncertainty of their destination.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as helping Harry and Luna find a way out by leading them to a staircase.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as being led by Neville along with Harry.

entities.name: cupboard
entities.description: The cupboard is described as a small opening onto a staircase.

entities.name: staircase
entities.description: The staircase is mentioned as being long and lit.

entities.name: corridors
entities.description: The corridors are mentioned as being patrolled by people at night.

relationships.description: Neville helps Harry find a way out.
Harry and Luna are led by Neville together.
Neville leads Harry and Luna to the cupboard.
Harry and Luna go up the staircase.
The corridors are patrolled by people at night.
